Job.Title: Frontend Developer
Job.JobDescription: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team and help design, build, and maintain scalable applications. The ideal candidate has experience with modern programming languages, clean code practices, and team collaboration. You will be responsible for writing reliable code, participating in code reviews, debugging issues, and contributing to architecture decisions. Familiarity with web frameworks, APIs, databases, and cloud platforms is highly valued. Youâ€™ll work closely with product managers and designers to deliver high-quality features. A passion for solving real-world problems, attention to detail, and a willingness to learn are essential.
